templates.name: BUG TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Summary*
<TI>Enter summary of the problem here.</TI>

*Dataset*
<TI>Enter the dataset that triggered the problem.</TI>

*Steps to Reproduce*
<TI>Enter detailed steps to reproduce here. More detail is better.</TI>

*Expected Behavior*
<TI>Enter what should happen here.</TI>

*Observed Behavior*
<TI>Enter what actually happen here.</TI>

*Additional Details*
<TI>Enter any other details such as examples,  Attach screenshots with the Attachment link below</TI>

templates.name: STORY TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Story*
As a <TI>type of user/persona</TI>, I want <TI>to perform some task</TI>, so that I can <TI>achieve some goal/benefit/value</TI>.

*Details*
<TI>Enter any details, clarifications, answers to questions, or points about implementation here.</TI>

*Additional Information*
<TI>Enter any background or references that may clarify what exactly needs to be built</TI>

*Acceptance Criteria*
<TI>Enter the conditions of satisfaction here. That is, the conditions that will satisfy the user/persona that the goal/benefit/value has been achieved.</TI>

templates.name: TASK TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Summary*
<TI>Enter a summary of the task here.</TI>

*Acceptance Criteria*
<TI>Enter a description of task completion</TI>

templates.name: EPIC TEMPLATE
templates.text:
*Epic*
As a <TI>type of user/persona</TI>, I want <TI>to perform some task</TI>, so that I can <TI>achieve some goal/benefit/value</TI>.

*Details*
<TI>Enter any details, clarifications, answers to questions, and points about implementation here.</TI>
